meanings.sent1: The cheetah outgallops the lion in a race.
meanings.sent2: The horse outgallops the donkey on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit outgallops the turtle in a playful race.
meanings.sent4: The wind outgallops the clouds across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The car outgallops the bicycle on the road.

meanings.definition: To outpace in a galloping race.
meanings.sent1: The gazelle outgallops the antelope in the savannah.
meanings.sent2: The champion horse outgallops all the competitors in the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outgallops the chipmunk in a friendly chase.
meanings.sent4: The river outgallops the stream as it flows downstream.
meanings.sent5: The athlete outgallops the rest of the team in the relay race.
